title: Ive been permanently suspended?
body: How to i get my account back. I didnt do anything.

replies.body: Heya, it looks like we locked the account as a security precaution.  Hit up our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so we can make sure it gets to the right hands.
